entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 8.
